①大锄。
②方言，刨地的镐，称“鐯钩”。
③用镐刨：鐯玉米。鐯高粱。

鐯字的基本解释

鐯
zhuō
大锄。
方言，刨地的镐，称“鐯钩”。
用镐刨：鐯玉米。鐯高粱。

鐯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhuó］
［《廣韻》張略切，入藥，知。］
方言。指用镐刨地或刨茬儿。

鐯字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鐯； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1323第20
【廣韻】張略切【正韻】職略切，?音灼。钁也。【爾雅·釋器】斫謂之鐯。【註】钁也。【疏】《說文》云钁，大鉏也。　又【集韻】直略切，音著。義同。

鐯字的起名意思

暂无。

鐯
Basic explanation of words
鐯
zhuō
Big hoe.
In the dialect, the pick that plows the ground is called "Fan Gou".
Plane with a pick: 鐯 corn. Tan Sorghum.
鐯
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhuó］
["Guang Yun" Zhang Lue cut, used as medicine, knowing. ]
dialect. Refers to planing the ground or stubble with a pick.
鐯
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　鐯; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1323 No. 20
[Guang Yun] Zhang Lue cut [Zheng Yun] The post is slightly cut, and the sound is burnt. Chi also. [Erya·Release Device] 斫 called the 鐯. [Note] Qi also. [Shu] "Shuowen" Yunqiu, Dayuanya.　[Jiyun] Straight and slightly cut, with sound. The same meaning.
